attributes.action: Converse with all country leaders at the UN summit to ban wet markets & publish
attributes.additional_details:
If this petition was published now you would have backing from the entire world. You rejected a request for a petition on this on the grounds of “not knowing what you’d like the government to do”.

We want your power to stop the unfair treatment of animals (sentient beings) as agreed within the EU. If not for the welfare of animals, then for the risk of another Coronavirus (which we know is going to come in another 10years if this isn’t stopped now).
attributes.background: Help secure a Universal Declaration on Animal Welfare (UDAW).

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307504
